animeDescription: Ruthless sorcerer Chivas Scotch is hired by a count named Cuttlefish to destroy an evil monster attacking a nearby village. But things go awry when Chivas fails to destroy the monster and he's forced to transfer his spirit in the body of his beautiful servant Gin Fizz.   (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Yao, Kazuki', 'Imai, Yuka', 'Houki, Katsuhisa', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Kosugi, Juurouta', 'Takimoto, Fujiko', 'Canna, Nobutoshi', 'Nishimura, Chinami']
